artist: Artist: James Romberger , et al.; Author: Bob McGlynn , et al.; Editor: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York

description: Saddle stitched binding, text and illustration of protestors facing police in the snow, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 136 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #13
